text: Storm over Asia () is a 1928 Soviet war drama movie directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin.Государевы художестваПотомок Чингисхана It stars Valéry Inkijinoff, I. Dedintsev, and Aleksandr Chistyakov. ==Actors== *Valéry Inkijinoff — Bair *I. Dedintsev — The British Commandant *Aleksandr Chistyakov — The Russian Rebel Leader *Viktor Tsoppi — Henry Hughes *F. title: Storm over Asia (1928 movie)
